name: Nitin Babbar
about: Experienced HR Operations with a demonstrated history of working in the Entertainment / Media, Fintec & Financial industry and with a track record of success in managing end-to-end HR operations across multiple locations. Proven expertise in employee full-cycle, payroll processing, benefits administration, and employee relations. Successfully led and coached a team of HR Operations Specialists to deliver high-quality HR services to employees across PAN India. Skilled in vendor management, data analysis, HRIS portal,Management Information Systems (MIS), HR Operations, Team Management, Attendance Management, Handing Audit, Joining Formalities, Exit formalities, Employee insurance (Medical, Term & accidental), Budgeting.Strong communication and interpersonal skills with the ability to build strong relationships with employees at all levels of the organization.Skilled in Management Information  Strong professional with a Master’s Degree focused in MBA from Institute of Management Technology, Ghaziabad.
